Description: Lower bowl sherd of Chian, probably Mature Animal Style, pottery chalice with top of foot; white slip; interior: glazed streaky brown; lotus buds in added white outline with added red centres; below, white chevron pattern between white bands; in tondo, rosette with alternating red and white petals; exterior reserved with two brown bands.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0530) (phase 2)
